description:
Jeff is http://anidb.net/ch40153 [Ketto]`s large Saint Bernard dog, quite old and sleepy but smarter than one might think.
It protects http://anidb.net/ch13883 [Jiji] during playing the replacement for the cat doll and even tricks Ketto into opening the door so that Jiji can return to http://anidb.net/ch11210 [Kiki].
name: Jeff
